name: Dungeon Fall (itch)
description:
Dungeon Fall is an interactive fairy tale that lets the player go along with a simple farmer who has a special purpose. Collect items that tell a rich history and follow along as the farmer discovers his true purpose as a key character in this world's epic tale.

This is the first chapter in the Tales for Erda saga. It is meant to be played in under thirty minutes and gives the player a good foundation for where the next Tales from Erda game starts off. Dungeon Fall is the perfect introduction to this world where everyone is not a hero, but has a purpose.

All proceeds of Dungeon Fall will go to the currently-in-development The Darkspeaker's Prince, which is the next game in Tales from Erda. Please consider donating if you enjoyed this prelude and would like to play more of this story in the future.

For more information please visit Knightwatch Entertainment

System Requirements:

  • OS: Windows XP or Newer
  • Processor: Dual Core CPU
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Storage: Less than 100 MB
